process.name: Nexus - Core
process.narrative: Giver basal adgang til Nexus, håndtere tokens, api kald og konvertering

stage.name: Stage1

stage.narrative:
Clean Up Page
This is an optional page where you might choose to perform some finalisation (or "cleanup") tasks as your business object is closed down.
The cleanup action will be called automatically immediately after closing your business object at the end of a business process.
You will not be able to call this action from a business process, nor will it be called at any other time than before the disposal of the business object.

stage.name: Hent credentials
stage.narrative:
Get the specified set of credentials.
An Exception will occur if access to the credentials is not allowed, based on the running Resource, Process and User.

input.name: Credentials Name
input.narrative: The name of the credentials to get

output.name: Password
output.narrative: The password

output.name: Username
output.narrative: The user name

output.name: Expiry Date
output.narrative: The expiry date

output.name: Status
output.narrative: The status

stage.name: Get system
stage.narrative:
Returns the value of the specified credentials property.
An Exception will occur if access to these credentials is not allowed (based on the running Resource, Process and User) or if the credentials do not contain a property with the specified name.

input.name: Credentials Name
input.narrative: The name of the credentials

input.name: Property Name
input.narrative: The name of the property

output.name: Property Value
output.narrative: The value of the property

stage.name: Get systemtype
stage.narrative:
Returns the value of the specified credentials property.
An Exception will occur if access to these credentials is not allowed (based on the running Resource, Process and User) or if the credentials do not contain a property with the specified name.

input.name: Credentials Name
input.narrative: The name of the credentials

input.name: Property Name
input.narrative: The name of the property

output.name: Property Value
output.narrative: The value of the property

input.name: Username
input.narrative: OPTIONAL: Basic Authentication username

input.name: Password
input.narrative: OPTIONAL: Basic Authenction password

input.name: Address URL
input.narrative: The URL to send the HTTP data to

input.name: Body
input.narrative: The body text of the HTTP request

input.name: Use Proxy
input.narrative: Set true if you need to use a proxy

input.name: Content Type
input.narrative: The content type of the HTTP request.

input.name: Method
input.narrative: The method of the HTTP request.

input.name: Proxy URL
input.narrative: OPTIONAL: The proxy url

input.name: Proxy Username
input.narrative: OPTIONAL: The proxy username

input.name: Proxy Password
input.narrative: OPTIONAL: The proxy password

input.name: Headers
input.narrative: OPTIONAL: Headers

input.name: Accept
input.narrative: OPTIONAL: Accept

input.name: Certificate ID
input.narrative: OPTIONAL: The id of the client authentication certificate

input.name: Force Pre Authorization
input.narrative: OPTIONAL: Force the request to send the 'Authorization' header for HTTP Basic.

input.name: File URL
input.narrative: OPTIONAL: Is the JSON Body a file instead?

input.name: Bearer Token
input.narrative: OPTIONAL: If you 'Use Bearer Token' is set to True, this must be set to the value of the actual Bearer Token.

input.name: Allow Auto Redirects
input.narrative: OPTIONAL: If you prefer to manually handle redirects (ie. HTTP 302) set this flag to False. Default value is True.

input.name: Maximum Redirects
input.narrative: OPTIONAL: If 'Allow Auto Redirect' is True, this controls the maximum number of redirects to allow. Default value is 50.

input.name: Request Timeout
input.narrative: OPTIONAL: This property controls the length of time, in milliseconds, until the request times out and throws a WebException. Default value is 100000 milliseconds (i.e. 100 seconds).

output.name: Result
output.narrative: The result from the Post query.

output.name: Headers as Json
output.narrative: The returned headers response as Json

output.name: Status Code
output.narrative: The HTTP status code associated with the request.

input.name: Collection Name
input.narrative: The name of the collection to act upon

output.name: Count
output.narrative: The number of rows counted in the collection

output.name: Json
output.narrative: Det rå json output

output.name: Statuskode
output.narrative: Http statuskoden for kaldet

output.name: Json
output.narrative: Det rå json output

output.name: Statuskode
output.narrative: Http statuskoden for kaldet

stage.name: Json til collection
stage.code:
var obj = Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert.DeserializeObject(json);
data = DeserializeGeneric(obj) as DataTable;

output.name: Json

input.name: Navn
input.narrative: navn på det globale rod api

input.name: Collection
input.narrative: The collection to read.

input.name: Field Name
input.narrative: The field within the collection to read.

input.name: Row Index
input.narrative: The row index within the collection to read from. The index is from 0 to N-1 (where N is the total number of rows in the collection).

output.name: Value Read
output.narrative: The value of the requested field as text.

stage.name: Hent sider
stage.narrative: Dette er generel funktionalitet til at håndtere sider i KMD Nexus. Anvendes både på lister og ved søgning.

input.name: Antal sider
input.narrative: Maksimale antal sider der skal hentes, -1 = hent alle (default)

input.name: Sidelink
input.narrative: Hvad er navnet på kolonnen der indeholder sidelinket

input.name: Main Collection
input.narrative: The collection to append to.

input.name: Collection to Append
input.narrative: The collection to append.

output.name: Combined Collection
output.narrative: The combined collection.

input.name: Collection Name
input.narrative: The name of the collection to act upon

output.name: Count
output.narrative: The number of rows counted in the collection

input.name: Collection
input.narrative: The collection to read.

input.name: Field Name
input.narrative: The field within the collection to read.

input.name: Row Index
input.narrative: The row index within the collection to read from. The index is from 0 to N-1 (where N is the total number of rows in the collection).

output.name: Value Read
output.narrative: The value of the requested field as text.

output.name: Json
output.narrative: Det rå json output

output.name: Statuskode
output.narrative: Http statuskoden for kaldet

output.name: Json
output.narrative: Det rå json output

output.name: Succes
output.narrative: Http statuskoden for kaldet

output.name: Count
output.narrative: The number of rows counted in the collection
